Alabama Call Center FAQs

Who is the best call center service provider Alabama?

TeleDirect is a 24/7 U.S. based call center for clients in Alabama. With inbound and outbound options, we help you save time and grow revenue.

What are the 3 types of call center in Alabama?

Call centers are inbound, outbound, or blended. As an extension of your company, TeleDirect offers multiple services to help you take advantage of every opportunity.

How many calls can TeleDirect Alabama call center handle?

TeleDirect’s trained and specialized agents handle nearly 10,000 calls monthly. We respond with speed, precision, and professionalism to each new caller or opportunity.

What is a good average speed to answer in Alabama call center?

At TeleDirect, our average time to answer is only 11 seconds. Agents reduce caller wait and handling times to deliver better experiences all-around.

What is the average calls per day at the Alabama call center?

On average, our monthly call center call volume is 9,400 calls. This equates to 300+ calls daily. We score nearly 1,700 calls to ensure exceptional results.

A U.S. based call center that quickly scales your business.
